author: cardinia
body:
@adewit @connorpa 

#### PR description:

Tool for producing DMR trends for Tracker Alignment:
The README file provides a more detailed description of the tool + some documentation doxygen style has been implemented in the macro.

#### PR validation:

The tool is used for the TkAl offline validation, it should not cause any problem for already existing tools.
title: Tool for producing DMR trends
